resources.string:
I do not own this content and I am not related to any of these videogames companies
This app started after a reddit user published an api to be able to consult the games of the Nintendo Switch eShop. Then I thought it was good to follow up from my cell to the games that are releasing soon, so I decided to develop the app.
https://www.reddit.com/r/NintendoSwitch/ NintendoSwitchEshopApi: https://github.com/lmmfranco/nintendo-switch-eshop
Used libraries:
